intro.title: Project Introduction
intro.desc: Gowlive is an open-source live streaming recording tool designed to provide users with convenient and efficient solutions for recording live content. It is suitable for scenarios where you need to save, review, or analyze live content for learning and communication. We encourage developers and enthusiasts to collaboratively improve features and enhance user experience.
intro.security: This project is for learning and technical exchange only. Do not use it for any commercial purposes or any behavior that infringes on the rights of others.

greeting.evening: Good evening, {nickname}! Relax after a long day!
greeting.night: It's late, sleep tight and have a sweet dream. Good night~
